mapper.select: select rno, boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardContent, boardDate, boardCategory from (select rownum rno, boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardContent, to_char(boardDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') boardDate, boardCategory from (select boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardContent, boardDate, boardCategory from board order by boardDate desc) where boardCategory = '일반') where rno < 4
select count(*) from board where boardCategory = '일반'

select count(*) from board
where boardTitle like '%'||#{search}||'%' and boardCategory = '일반'
where boardContent like '%'||#{search}||'%' and boardCategory = '일반'
where ( boardTitle like '%'||#{search}||'%' or boardContent like '%'||#{search}||'%' ) and boardCategory = '일반'
where memberId like '%'||#{search}||'%' and boardCategory = '일반'
where boardCategory = '일반'

select rno, boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardContent, boardHits, boardDate, boardCategory from (select rownum rno, boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardContent, boardHits, to_char(boardDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') boardDate, boardCategory from (select boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardContent, boardHits, boardDate, boardCategory from board order by boardDate desc) where boardCategory = '일반') where rno between #{start} and #{end}
